title: Granite, Wood Floors, Large, Parking Garage, Skyline Views!
posting_body: Luxury Loft Apartment Living in North Dallas.
Enjoy Beautiful Hardwood Flooring, a Contemporary Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances and Custom Cabinetry, and a Modern Lighting Package in Each Home.
Choose From One of Our Open-Concept Studio, One, or Two Bedroom Floor Plans That Comes Equipped with a Washer and dryer in Each Unit, Window Coverings, and Plenty of Storage Space.
Our Luxury North Dallas Lofts are Located Within a Short Distance from the Best Shopping and Dining That Dallas to Offer.
Pet-friendly Loft Apartments with Outdoor Grilling Stations, a Dog Washing Station, and a Grand Resort Swimming Pool with Cool Water
Experience our Interactive Resident Clubhouse Designed  perfect for Entertaining.
Located Close to Dallas' Hospital District, Residents Enjoy Easy Access to Business and Leisure.
With Skyline Views and Rooftop Decks.
Mention ad D 243 DASH Apartment Locators
